rooms.description: Spacious entrance with natural lighting and minimalistic decor to welcome residents.
Modern living area featuring comfortable seating, ambient lighting, and a view towards the pool. Open floor plan for seamless connectivity with dining space.
Integrated dining area adjacent to living room; designed for flexibility and occasional entertaining.
Modern kitchen with efficient workflow, ample storage, and energy-efficient appliances. Designed per local building codes.
spacious bedroom featuring abundant natural light, built-in wardrobes, and a private balcony overlooking the pool area. Vastu guidelines ensure positive energy flow.
Cozy study/study nook integrated into the living space, providing a quiet retreat for work or reading.
Convenient storage area to optimize space usage and maintain clutter-free interiors.

openings.description: Large, inviting entrance door ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Strategically placed windows to optimize cross-ventilation and sunlight distribution in accordance with Vastu principles.
Balconies attached to the living room and master bedroom for external views and fresh air.

features.description: Integrated outdoor swimming pool, designed to meet local building norms with proper fencing and safety features.

vastu_overview: The layout is designed to optimize natural light, air flow, and positive energy alignment as per Vastu principles. The placement of rooms considers directional alignments for harmony in living spaces.
building_norms: Adheres to Indian residential building codes including proper load-bearing structures, fire safety, and accessibility standards.
